TopicTitle: Will we ever get a fix for the random crashing?

Articles.Content:
It's 3 weeks since the last patch and parts of the game are still broken. >_>

I'd put this under development suggestion, but random crashing being a bad thing is neither a suggestion, nor secret developer knowledge.

Edited May 21, 2016 by Temeter
They've been on vacation and with any luck during that time have accrued lots of verbose and log-heavy bug reports on the issue. Have you filed any?
You can help finding a solution by posting information about your crashes here.

All of my logs at this point are from modded installs (which take like 7+ minutes to load). Usually they aren't considered helpful.

Edited May 21, 2016 by Temeter

7 minutes! And I thought waiting 30-45 seconds for a ~650 part craft (un-modded) to load on the Launchpad, was 'waiting a long time,' lol.

I see in the recent patches and some bug report updates, that Squad staff are still hammering away at unresolved bugs; its the nature of the word 'random' that the causes and reproduction methods can be hard to nail down.
The random crashes are probably caused by bugs in Unity. Unless KSP gets ported to Unity 5.3 chances are slim that it's possible to fix them...

The devs have been on vacation the last three weeks and are expected to be back next week. In the mean time you can help by submitting crash and bug reports to the tracker so they have as much information as possible when they return to work.
